title: have looked high and low
content:
I've tried this both through whatthefont.com and identifont, and posted on 2 forums that I participate in. One member recommended typophile so here I am!

This is for a local customer, they had a logo created on some freelancing website, and all they were provided was a 96 dpi .jpg. Basically I have to recreate this as a vector graphic, and I can't find this font ANYWHERE. Any ideas?

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo\_with\_slogan.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404185353/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_with_slogan.jpg) | 17.04 KB |
author: CherokeeGraphic...

comments.content: Thank you so much, that is a huge help!
